lst.name: sentence
lst.str: A key Senate Budget Committee source told Reuters he believes this very unusual unanimous opposition was by design among congressional Republicans, perhaps with the tacit approval of the White House.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: That law, named after Republican Senators Phil Gramm of Texas, Warren Rudman of New Hampshire and Democrat Ernest Hollings of South Carolina, calls for a balanced budget by 1991 through a series of set deficit targets that Congress must meet.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: But if they withdraw this support the result can only be further problems, including higher interest rates for Americans.
